concept.title: LwDITA map
concept.shortdesc: The LwDITA map contains the fundamental structures that are necessary to create a content collection model and establish relationships among resources.

conbody.p: A LwDITA map can contain the following structural elements:

dlentry.dd: A map describes the relationships among a set of resources, such as LwDITA and DITA topics

conbody.p: A LwDITA map can be represented, with modifications to accommodate different authoring languages, in XDITA, HDITA, and MDITA.
